body.name: comica Handheld Interview Microphone, HRM-S 3.5mm TRRS Cardioid Condenser Reporter Microphone for Recording, Speech, Stage, Vocal Mic for Smartphones Laptops and DSLR Cameras
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 3 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 15 hrs 3 mins
features: 📷【Cardioid Pattern】Comica HRM-S interview microphone can correctly capture your voice, reduce the pickup of the sound from the side, improve the isolation of the required sound source, and make the sound clearer and more realistic.

📷【Wide Usage】This condenser handheld mic has a frequency response of 60Hz-20kHz, which can maximize the clarity of the sound, It can be used for hosting events, speeches, interviews, recording and other related purposes.

📷【Smartphones Interview Microphone】This wired interview microphone is specially designed for smartphone users, and its excellent sound quality is ideal for your interviews, reports and social media videos (NOTE: If you are an IOS user or an Android USB C interface user, you need the original mic adapter cable).
📷【Make Your Recording Purity】This professional presentation microphone has a 100% all-metal construction and super low self-noise, ensuring your recorded sound clearer and more natural.

📷【Confidence to Buy】The HRM-S high quality microphone is designed to ease your technical woes, not add to them. If you encounter any issues, please contact us (Contact the seller or Ask a question). We will try our best to help you solve it until you are satisfied.

📷【One-year Warranty Service】We've focused on only 2 goals-professional audio equipment and top-notch customer support. If you have any problems, such as the wrong products, broken or using problems, etc., just contact us. We will definitely give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Works with Comica CVM-SPX-TC Comica CVM -SPX-TC is a 3.5mm TRS TRRS to USB C Adapter, which can be used to connect the HRM-S microphone with USB C smartphones, laptops etc. Learn More Works with Comica CVM-CPX Comica CVM-CPX is a 3.5mm TRRS to TRS Audio Adapter, which can be used to connect the HRM-S microphone with 3.5mm TRS cameras. Learn More

Previous page No batteries required, just plug in your device and start recording instantly! The recording is more smooth and natural, achieving excellent voice. 3.5mm TRRS Interface Interview anytime, anywhere, with more professional reporter/interview device for smartphone users Next page 1 Plug and Play 2 Better Shielding 3 Super Low Self-noise 4 Designed for Smartphone

Technology Parameters Acoustic Principle Condenser Polar Pattern Cardioid Frequency Response 60Hz~20kHz Sensitivity -35dB±2dB S/N 75dB Equivalent Noise 19dBA Maximum SPL 130dB Dynamic Range 111dB Net Weight 222g Cable Length 3.5m

Does it work directly with iPhone? No, the HRM-S handheld mic only has a 3.5mm TRRS cable. If you want to use it on an iPhone, you need to use the ORIGINAL 3.5mm TRRS to Lightning adapter purchased from APPLE Official Website.（Note: Lightning adapter cable needs to have OTG function.） Does this microphone work well when recording or video shooting with a smartphone? For Android smartphones, the microphone works well in Audio Mode; In Video Mode, we suggest you to try a 3rd party's video APP (Except Android 13); For IOS system (iPhone), the mic works well either in Audio or Video mode. Does it work directly with camera? It cannot be directly connected. An adapter cable is required. If your camera is a TRS interface, you will prepare a TRRS to TRS audio adapter. What should I do if I have a problem with using the microphone? If you have any questions after purchase, you can contact Comica's official after-sales service. We will give you some professional advice and satisfactory solutions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price I think is the best option here on Amazon. Great feel and it looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a really good interview microphone for your smartphone.
reviews.reviewText: What's awesome is that this microphone is specifically designed for folks who film with their smartphones, like me. The mic comes with a cool carrying pouch in order to easily carry this around. The microphone feels solid and the cord is a nice length so you're not stuck having to position your phone super close to it. I love the fact it comes with a logo. You can print out your logo and stick right on there giving it a really professional look. All that is nice but where this microphone really shines is the quality of audio. I must admit that I was totally surprised that the quality of this microphone was this good. Sometimes a little too good. It would have been nice if they would have included a dead cat for recording outside on windy days. I'm also going to use this microphone on my make shit boom pole when I shoot my next short film. That's how good the audio quality is. At this price point, I don't think you can go wrong by picking this up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound, easy to use, great price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Overall this is a great microphone for your smartphone/tablet. I used this in a facebook live video, and attached a clip to hear the audio quality. It works great right out of the box, just plug it in. (Though you might need an adapter like I did to go from a USB-C port to audio. NOTE: Use the Apple brand one and not a 3rd party one)I like that it also includes a carrying case as well and plenty of cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: the quality it records is excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Interview Mic for the price
reviews.reviewText: This Interview mic from comica is great, it picks up voices very well. It can be a little noisy if your input is too high. Overall if you're looking for a interview mic i would recommend this mic to you, it feels good in hand, its light weight and it looks great. You can connect it to your phone or camera which makes it very convenient in many different situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Couldn’t figure out how to use?!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried following the instructions and spent hours googling and searching YouTube to figure out how to use this microphone but still haven’t managed to figure it out. I have an iPhone 13 plus and even downloaded a few apps that I thought would help and bought extra cords, nothing works. Super disappointed by how challenging this has been for what looks like a really nice product. If someone has any clue what’s wrong I would super appreciate some advice seeing as I’m passed the timeframe to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, sound quality very good
reviews.reviewText: We do interviews with this mic on iPhones using and adapter and the sound is very good. I was surprised how good it sounded so I bought another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: What an awesome product, as a person now getting into the business of news casting and getting a product like this from Comica is very helpful to what I’m planning on doing. The sound quality is phenomenal cause you can’t really hear background noises, and it makes your voice pop do whoever is watching your video will hear you loud and clear. The value for money is reasonable cause if you look for a microphone like this from other companies is in the $100 and up range, so buying thing for close to $70 is not bad. The quality of the material is great and I have no complaints over it. Matter of fact I’m planning on buying a couple more as time goes on.

I purchased this mic after watching a lot of reviews, I was very unsure about the product quality. Once I received the product the packaging was good, and the built quality of the mic is also very good.When I plugged it in my phone and recorded the video I was really amazed by the quality at this price, I used it outside for a while and the results were also good for outdoor recordings. The product also comes with a good quality case which also adds to the comfort of carrying anywhere.Overall good mic with a good price.
N'est pas efficace pour restreindre le bruit autour lors de l'entrevue même si il est annoncé comme unidirectionnel.
